content.rendered:
CONTACT US

At LULLY & ROSE, our passion for flowers stems from cherished childhood memories and generations of floral tradition. We believe in the simplicity and elegance of gifting flowers, allowing their natural beauty to shine through in our seasonal arrangements. With over a decade of experience as a qualified floral designer, Rachael’s vision is to inspire others through our unique and love-filled creations. 

We are here to ensure your experience with us is exceptional in every way, and we would love to hear from you! Whether you have questions or need assistance with an order, don’t hesitate to reach out. Contact us using the form below and let’s create something beautiful together.

We will be in touch as soon as possible to address your needs.

With love, Rach x

Our Location

Gold Coast, QLD, 4210

Mobile 0481 810 535

info@lullyandrose.com.au

Opening Hours

Tuesday – Friday 8am – 3pm
Saturday By Appointment Only
Sunday Closed
Closed on Public Holidays

Delivery Hours

Tuesday – Friday 10am – 6pm
Saturday By Request Only
Sunday Closed
SAME DAY DELIVERY AVAILABLE

Location Map

Contact Form

This form is currently undergoing maintenance. Please try again later.

CONTACT US

Questions? Special requests? Just want to say hello? We’re here for you!

Feel free to visit our Delivery Suburbs & Pricing page for information about flower delivery across the Gold Coast.

Have other questions? Check out our Frequently Asked Questions page for more details.

Reach out to us, and we’ll personally respond to your inquiry.

LULLY & ROSE Floral Studio voted in the ‘Top 10 Best Florist Gold Coast‘.
